articles.author: Jordan  Freiman, Kathryn  Watson, Lucia I Suarez Sang, Nick  Kurtz
articles.title: 2026 FIFA Men's World Cup draw groups set as USA to face Paraguay, Australia and UEFA playoff winner - CBS News
articles.description: The 2026 Men's World Cup will be held across the United States, Canada and Mexico next summer.
articles.content:
Superior Player of the match trophy is displayed during the FIFA World Cup 2026 Official Draw at the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts on Dec. 05, 2025 in Washington, DC.
